name: My EMR Choice
tag_list: emr, ehr, hitech, electronic-medical-records, electronic-health-records, phr, personal-health-records, verizon-health-information-exchange, comcast-business-class, mckesson, ge, apple, ipad
overview:
My EMR Choice assists physicians, consumers and Electronic Medical Record system providers (EMR) in complying with the HITECH Act of 2009. HITECH calls for physicians to adoption EMR systems in replacement of paper medical charts and records. $25 billion has been funded for the EMR initiative.

My EMR Choice helps physicians select from the hundreds of EMR providers, as well as selecting broadband and wireless carriers, patient’s Personal Health Records (PHR), tablet computer hardware, financing, practice web portals and all other aspects of healthcare IT overhaul and initiatives.
